Signal_Analysis

Speech_Analysis is a package that analyzes audio signals, and calculates the fundamental frequency (F_0), the harmonics-to-noise ratio (HNR), glottal pulses, and jitter of a speakerâ€™s voice. This package is comparable to Praat.

Quickstart

pip install Signal_Analysis
